languages.text: "Представьте себе. Видимо, ставки для них достаточно высоки. Сам Уралон Жестокий не поленился доставить свою богохульную персону на Ефрат-II. Кунрад Войгтвир, кстати, тоже там — я слышал, у вас осталось неоконченное дело. Щедро отдаю его вам — когда закончите, можете просто утилизировать его бренные останки, не передавая на дознание в Инквизицию. Это мой подарок".

"Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."
languages.original_text: "Представьте себе. Видимо, ставки для них достаточно высоки. Сам Уралон Жестокий не поленился доставить свою богохульную персону на Ефрат-II. Кунрад Войгтвир, кстати, тоже там — я слышал, у вас осталось неоконченное дело. Щедро отдаю его вам — когда закончите, можете просто утилизировать его бренные останки, не передавая на дознание в Инквизицию. Это мой подарок".

traits.locale_text: "If you can believe it. Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough to warrant it. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

"If you can believe it. Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough to warrant it. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

"If you can believe it. Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough to warrant it. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

"Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

languages.text: “很显然，这颗行星对他们非常重要。残暴者乌拉隆已经亲自前往欧夫拉茨二号星。顺便一提，昆拉德·维特威尔也在那里。我听说你们两人之间还有没解决的恩怨。这个人你可以全权处置，等你处理完之后，他的遗体你也可以自行处理，没必要移交给审判庭进行审讯。就当这是我送给你的礼物吧。”
languages.original_text: "Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

traits.locale_text: “这确实很让人难以置信。很显然，这颗行星对他们非常重要，他们必须全力以赴。残暴者乌拉隆已经亲自前往欧夫拉茨二号星。顺便一提，昆拉德·维特威尔也在那里。我听说你们两人之间还有没解决的恩怨。这个人你可以全权处置，等你处理完之后，他的遗体你也可以自行处理，没必要移交给审判庭进行审讯。就当这是我送给你的礼物吧。”

languages.text: «Claramente, creen que hay suficiente en juego. El blasfemo Uralon el Cruel se ha presentado personalmente en Eufrates II. Además, también se encuentra allí Kunrad Voigtvir. Tengo entendido que tienen asuntos pendientes. Seré generoso y le dejaré ocuparse de él como quiera. Cuando termine, basta con que se deshaga de sus restos mortales. No hace falta que los entregue a la Inquisición para su estudio. Considérelo un regalo por mi parte».
languages.original_text: "Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

traits.locale_text: «Por increíble que parezca. Claramente, creen que hay suficiente en juego para justificarlo. El blasfemo Uralon el Cruel se ha presentado personalmente en Eufrates II. Además, también se encuentra allí Kunrad Voigtvir. Tengo entendido que tienen asuntos pendientes. Seré generoso y le dejaré ocuparse de él como quiera. Cuando termine, basta con que se deshaga de sus restos mortales. No hace falta que los entregue a la Inquisición para su estudio. Considérelo un regalo por mi parte».

languages.text: 「明らかに彼らにとってはリスクの高い状況だ。残酷なウラロンは不敬な自我を目覚めさせ、ユーフラテス・IIへと自らやって来た。ちなみに、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルもそこにいる。お前たちには因縁があると聞いている。奴の扱いはお前に任せてやろう。決着が付いたなら、遺体の処理まで進めて構わぬ。異端審問庁の審問に引き渡す必要はない。私からの贈り物だと思ってくれ」
languages.original_text: "Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

traits.locale_text: 「明らかに彼らにとってはリスクの高い状況だ。残酷なウラロンは不敬な自我を目覚めさせ、ユーフラテス・IIへと自らやって来た。ちなみに、クンラッド・ボイトヴィルもそこにいる。お前たちには因縁があると聞いている。奴の扱いはお前に任せてやろう。決着が付いたなら、遺体の処理まで進めて構わぬ。異端審問庁の審問に引き渡す必要はない。私からの贈り物だと思ってくれ」

languages.text: « De toute évidence, l'enjeu est suffisamment grand pour qu'Uralon le Cruel ait décidé de gratifier Euphrate-II de sa présence profane. Il est d'ailleurs à noter que Kunrad Voigtvir s'y trouve également ; j'ai cru comprendre que vous aviez un compte à régler, et lui, je vous le laisse de bonne grâce. Quand vous en aurez terminé, vous n'aurez qu'à vous débarrasser de son corps. L'Inquisition ne vous le réclamera pas pour enquête. Considérez cela comme un cadeau de ma part. »
languages.original_text: "Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais, c'est difficile à croire. De toute évidence, l'enjeu est suffisamment grand pour qu'Uralon le Cruel ait décidé de gratifier Euphrate-II de sa présence profane. Il est d'ailleurs à noter que Kunrad Voigtvir s'y trouve également ; j'ai cru comprendre que vous aviez un compte à régler, et lui, je vous le laisse de bonne grâce. Quand vous en aurez terminé, vous n'aurez qu'à vous débarrasser de son corps. L'Inquisition ne vous le réclamera pas pour enquête. Considérez cela comme un cadeau de ma part. »

languages.text: "Offenbar steht für sie genügend auf dem Spiel. Uralon der Grausame hat sich tatsächlich bemüht, persönlich auf Eufrates II zu erscheinen. Kunrad Voigtvir ist zufällig auch dort – wie ich hörte, habt Ihr beide noch eine Rechnung offen. Ich überlasse ihn großzügig Euch. Wenn Ihr mit ihm fertig seid, entsorgt seine sterblichen Überreste einfach – die Inquisition benötigt sie nicht für eine Untersuchung. Betrachtet das als Geschenk von mir."
languages.original_text: "Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."

traits.locale_text: "Kaum zu glauben, ich weiß. Offenbar steht für sie genügend auf dem Spiel, um das zu rechtfertigen. Uralon der Grausame hat sich tatsächlich bemüht, persönlich auf Eufrates II zu erscheinen. Kunrad Voigtvir ist zufällig auch dort – wie ich hörte, habt Ihr beide noch eine Rechnung offen. Ich überlasse ihn großzügig Euch. Wenn Ihr mit ihm fertig seid, entsorgt seine sterblichen Überreste einfach – die Inquisition benötigt sie nicht für eine Untersuchung. Betrachtet das als Geschenk von mir."

languages.text: "İşin ucunda mühim şeyler olsa gerek. Zalim Uralon, Eufrates II'de bizzat bulunmak için gayret göstermiş. Tesadüfe bak ki Kunrad Voigtvir de orada. Duyduğuma göre ikinizin kapanmamış hesabı varmış. Cömertlik edip onu sana bırakacağım. İşini bitirdiğinde cesedinden kurtulabilirsin, soruşturma için Engizisyon'a teslim etmene gerek yok. Hediyem olsun."
languages.original_text: "Clearly, the stakes for them are high enough. Uralon the Cruel has stirred his profane self to make a personal appearance on Eufrates II. Kunrad Voigtvir, incidentally, is also there — I hear you two have unfinished business. Him I will generously leave to you. When you are finished with him, you may simply dispose of his mortal remains — no need to surrender them to the Inquisition for an inquest. Consider it my gift."
